document.full_text: how much money ebay makes from microsoft's purchase of skype depends in part on the amount it repatriates from overseas, although it is clear that ebay's profit will be at least $800 million or so.
document.title: how ebay fared in latest skype deal
lines_and_colors: how much money ebay makes from microsoft's purchase of skype depends in part on the amount it repatriates from overseas, although it is clear that ebay's profit will be at least $800 million or so.
